item.title: Where we're going we don't need roads
item.description: When you’re all out of beer and you get to the supermarket just after closing there’s really only one sensible option. Fire up the flux capacitor and hop in your trusty Time Machine

item.title: No more heroes any more
item.description: Drinktober 2023 comics week comes to a thrilling conclusion as our heroes battle a dread alliance of Venomous Villains!

item.title: Whatever happened to...
item.description: Beervengers assemble! Today’s thrill-packed episode see’s Drinktober’s mightiest heroes gathered together to face their deadliest threat yet! Tune in tomorrow to see what happens next - same drink time, same drink channel!

item.title: I wanna take you to the Doom Bar! Doom Bar! Doom Bar!
item.description: Welcome, Traveller! Welcome to the Latveria Arms! Come on in and have a drink. All are welcome (except that accursed fool Richards) at the DOOM Bar!

item.title: Pay close attention!
item.description: Laundry day at the Avengers tower is always a chore. It takes a lot of effort to get all the creases fully out if you want to put on an Iron Shirt

item.title: Horns and daggers
item.description: “This one time when we were children he transformed himself into a snake. And he knows that I love snakes. So I went to pick up the snake to admire it, and he transformed back into himself and he says “MYAH it’s me”. And then he stabbed me.”

item.title: Getting SMASHed!
item.description: It’s day two of Comics Week and today sees the appearance of a titanic figure… Transformed by radiation and fueled by his endless rage, it’s the Incredible Hulk, and there’s only one thing he wants to do : SMASH!

item.title: Magnetic Field
item.description: It’s Comic Week here at Drinktober towers, and to kick things off we’ve got Magneto, mutant master of magnetism. Here he is taking a break from super-villainy to tend the crops in his Magnetic Field

item.title: Spellcasting : D R I N K
item.description: You’re in a room with a bar. A wizard offers you a flagon of ale, while the jester suggests a horn of mead. The room begins to spin and suddenly you’re in a corridor full of spears. Caution, team! Choose your next move wisely!

item.title: Turtley hardcore
item.description: When your band is looking for someone to deliver shell-melting solos, that’s when you need to call on the services of a Master Shredder!

item.title: What do you mean, "wrong Jason"?
item.description: It’s Friday the 13th of Drinktober, so of course it’s time for an appearance from everyone’s favourite machete-wielding hockey enthusiast, seen here on one of his lesser known adventures in ancient Greece.

item.title: Hedging bets
item.description: A special guest appearance today by the Beercave hedgehogs, Maui and Muffin. Here they hitting up the casino for a high stakes poker game. They say the secret to their success lies in hogging all the good cards and hedging their bets!

item.title: It’s a tradition, or an old charter, or something
item.description: I’m not even going to try to explain the Padstow ‘Obby ‘Oss festival. It’s just another Perfectly Normal thing that we do on Perfectly Normal Island,. Think yourselves lucky nobody was doing an Up Helly Aa beer, otherwise everything would be on fire right now…

item.title: Saddle Thor!
item.description: Saddle up, warriors! It’s time to grab yourselves a horn of mead and head on down to the Viking Rodeo!

item.title: Rage against the machine
item.description: Step on up, folks - it’s time! Welcome to the greatest combat event of all time. In the red corner, weighing in at 155kg kilos of titanium and bad attitude. The Future of Law Enforcement! The OCP Assassin! Half man! Half machine! All badass! Robocop!!! And in the blue corner, weighing in at 120 kilos of booze and belligerence. He’s rough! He’s tough! He’s beginning to realise he’s very badly outmatched!

item.title: Lost in Space
item.description: Even for a galactic bounty hunter it can be hard figuring out directions when you’re backpacking on an unfamiliar planet in the outer rim. I’ve been wandering in circles for what seems like hours now but I think I’ve finally got it figured out. This is the way!

item.title: Jesus Christ He Is Massive
item.description: After laying dormant on the bottom of the ocean for over 2000 years He has returned! Awoken by the shockwave from unlicensed nuclear experiments and transformed by radiation into a rage driven monster of superhuman size and strength. Jesus Christ! He is Massive!

item.title: It's better down where it's wetter
item.description: Here at Drinktober we’re never afraid to sink to new depths and today is no exception as we descend to the very bottom of the ocean.

item.title: Stick and bucket
item.description: Many years later, Order 67 turned out to be far less dramatic than its predecessor. The Emperor still seems to enjoy it though!

item.title: Happy little beers
item.description: Hello, I’m Beerb Ross. Welcome to todays episode the Art of Happiness. Why don’t you just sit back and relax while I work on this little number here, or maybe grab your brushes and paint along? We’ve got a bunch of nice little folks having a fun old time here down here at the pub, and I’m just gonna go ahead and add in some happy little beers here. Don’t they look tasty?

item.title: Magic dance!
item.description: You remind me of the beer What beer? The beer with the power What power? The power of voodoo! Who do? You do I do what? Remind me of the beer

item.title: Welcome to the Hotel East Yorkshire
item.description: Todays installment sees the appearance of a great and majestic bird of prey. Perched high on a mountain top, ever alert and ready to swoop down and seize the unsuspecting in his mighty talons. Behold, the Big Eagle!

item.title: Wanted: Dredd or Alive
item.description: To kick off Drinktober 2023, we return once again to the mean streets of Mega City One, where Judge Beerman is in pursuit of a most dastardly villain. One thing’s for sure - there’s no escaping the law when you’re Wanted : Dredd or Alive!

item.title: Back to the Beercave
item.description: And so we’re back - from outer space! Has it really been a whole year already? Wow, time really does fly! In just over a week’s time we’ll be unleashing another fabulous month of Drinktober content, and it’s going to be wild! We’ve got freakery and geekery, mutants and maniacs, Gods and monsters all lined up to bring you the most epic Drinktober yet, so crack yourselves a few cans and settle in for Drinktober 2023
